turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm having trouble with my SmartBrew coffee maker. It's not turning on.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting SmartBrew support. I understand your coffee maker isn't turning on. Can you confirm the model number, please? It's usually located on the bottom of the device.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's the SB-7000. I've checked the power outlet, and it's working fine with other devices. I'm so frustrated; I need my coffee!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, SB-7000. Thanks! Could you please try unplugging the coffee maker from the outlet for about 60 seconds and then plugging it back in? This will sometimes reset the internal circuits.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, okay, I just tried that. Still nothing. Dead as a doornail.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I see. Hmmm. Have you checked the water reservoir to ensure it's properly seated? Sometimes a slightly misaligned reservoir can prevent the unit from powering on as a safety measure.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, the water reservoir is fine. I even tried taking it out and putting it back in a few times. Is there some kind of hidden fuse or something I can check?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The SB-7000 doesn't have a user-accessible fuse. However, there's a small reset button located on the bottom, near the serial number. It's very small and recessed. You might need a pen or paperclip to press it. Try holding it down for 5 seconds while the unit is plugged in.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I found the reset button! I pressed it... and... IT WORKED! Thank you so much! Why isn't that in the manual?!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Great! I'm happy to hear that resolved the issue. We appreciate your feedback regarding the manual. I will pass that suggestion along to our documentation team. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
